item.title: C Demystified: Mastering Programming
item.description: Discover one of the earliest programming languages and what it has to offer What is C? Why do I need to learn about the 3rd letter of the alphabet!? Is something that you’re probably thinking about right now. C is a low-level language. It didn’t use to be. Back in the day when people carved punch cards out of granite, C was an incredible way to be free of the drudgery of lower-level languages like assembly19.
